metadata.inclusion:
Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
When prompted by your primary controller, click the PROG button three times in one second.
metadata.exclusion:
Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
When prompted by your primary controller, click the PROG button three times in one second.
metadata.reset:
Click the PROG 2 times quickly then hold for at least 10 seconds.
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
